25 Ted Cruz: The sombrero memes will now Cease! posted 2 hours ago by CyanScales 1 comments award share report block Ted Cruz @tedcruz • 13h As predicted, the Democrats have finally surrendered after 43 days of a government shutdown. And as promised, the sombrero memes will cease…after this one. 🤣🤣
